Html:
I am unable to get various apps for the TI-84 Plus Silver to install in the wabbit emulator, I try dragging and dropping but I can't seem to figure out the procedure to do so, or it just isn't working. Can someone help please?

I get an error when I try to drag and drop apps to the wabbitemu. I choose second... Link... Recieve... 1:Recieve... and then drag and drop and get the error "a problem with wabbitemu prevented the file from getting sent". I've tried a few different apps with the same problem. Emu is set to run as TI-84+ Silver (non color) in Windows 8.1 64. The error prevents me from even getting to where I could "save" it.

Download the app you want to install, then drag and drop the file on to the lcd.

BuckeyeDude
